title: Zombie Gunship v1.9.1 (Unlimited Coins & All Max Upgrade)
description:
Zombie Gunship puts you in the gunner seat of a heavily-armed AC-130 ground attack aircraft. Strategically fire your powerful guns to slay endless waves of zombies and protect the remaining survivors of the zombie apocalypse!

OPTIMIZED FOR A WIDE RANGE OF TABLETS AND PHONES

3D NIGHT VISION DISPLAY 
Toggle between white and black hot modes. Use your radar to quickly detect and eliminate the zombie threat.

AUTHENTIC WEAPONS
- 25mm Gatling gun 
- 40mm Bofors auto-cannon 
- 105mm Howitzer cannon

COMPLETE OBJECTIVES, EARN RANKS, and beat other gunners on the leaderboard!
COLLECT a BOUNTY for each ZOMBIE KILL 
Use coins to upgrade your armaments and increase your zombie killing efficiency.

What's New: (Updated: September 20, 2013)

Hey there Zombie Gunners, here comes 1.9.1 with some great fixes:
- The repeating sound issue with the 25mm gatling gun is now fixed!
- Coin purchases are fully operational!

More info: Credit: Matrix by Neo

https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.limbic.ac130" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
